findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification may expose parties to unmitigated risks, particularly if confidential information is misused or if there are breaches of the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Lack of audit rights can hinder the ability to ensure compliance with the NDA, potentially allowing for misuse of confidential information without detection.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.
